S.FORM: == kakiliman == Sayaway a binacadan akay u sayaway a kanatal, ""First Nations First Nations, Premières Nations" u pinaay nu Kanata nu mapulungay a binacadan nu ngangan, nu milecaday atu Indian malecaday, mutudu' tu aydaay nu Kanata nu itidaay nu amisan nu yincumin atu laylay, nika cayay pasu inniwte a tademaw atu mayti a tademaw. :First Nations,法語:Premières Nations), . namakacuwaay Kanata a yincumin"sayaway a binacadan" First Nations),inniwte a tademaw, Inuit, mayti" (Métis)amasakaputay a saupu. "(Inuit),和"梅蒂人"(Métis)組成. Nika uduma a tademaw natahekal i 1970 amihcaan, sapisakaliyuh tu maydihay a micalilaw tu "Indian" . "First Nation"取代名稱上原來的"band". nilaculan ayda"Indian" ina kamu nu hulic a sasakamuen, nika i Kanata caay tu pi cukaymas. 目前" . u syihu nu amilika atu duma a kanatal micukaymas tu "Native Americans" wini caay picukaymas i kanatal, itawya sa u sapangangan tu amilika nu yincumin "Native Americans" . 同樣,"Native Canadian"一詞也不常見,然而"Natives"和"autochthones"(希臘詞根auto和chthon, "部落"或"民族". sayaway a binacadan nu mikuwanay a syihu tapang atu milubang, idaw ku sapikuwan, tu pdekuwan, cacudadan. Nu mapulungay a kakawaw, nuhekal sapisikul atu sapisaluma nu hulic idaw ku ahebalay tu sapikuwan. Tada malakuwit ku nipicabas tu kawaw mikuwanay nu syihu cay pakalaheci sa. sayaway a binacadan nukaudip cay kakapah,nikaudip nu heni caay pakacabi tu hayti atu mahka masumaday nu tayliwku, sayaway a binacadan nayay ku kakulian, kiyu maungang misahicahica, sausin ku nikaudip nu heni, cay katalakaw, nipicuda inayay ,pakuyucay talakaw, u musabili' henay laetus tu ku biliay nayay t uku eking, caay kakapah ku udip. . unikaudip nu lutungay tahina ku maudipay, 2001 isaw ku nisausi sayaway a binacadan tatama tatayna maselep ku nikaudip .

== kakiliman == Sayaway a binacadan akay o sayaway a kanatal, ""First Nations First Nations, Premières Nations" o pinaay no Kanata no mapolongay a binacadan no ngangan, no milecaday ato Indian malecaday, motodo' to aydaay no Kanata no itidaay no amisan no yincomin ato laylay, nika cayay paso inniwte a tademaw ato mayti a tademaw. :First Nations,法語:Premières Nations), . namakacowaay Kanata a yincomin"sayaway a binacadan" First Nations),inniwte a tademaw, Inoit, mayti" (Métis)amasakapotay a saopo. "(Inoit),和"梅蒂人"(Métis)組成. Nika odoma a tademaw natahekal i 1970 amihcaan, sapisakaliyoh to maydihay a micalilaw to "Indian" . "First Nation"取代名稱上原來的"band". nilacolan ayda"Indian" ina kamo no holic a sasakamoen, nika i Kanata caay to pi cokaymas. 目前" . o syiho no amilika ato doma a kanatal micokaymas to "Native Americans" wini caay picokaymas i kanatal, itawya sa o sapangangan to amilika no yincomin "Native Americans" . 同樣,"Native Canadian"一詞也不常見,然而"Natives"和"aotochthones"(希臘詞根aoto和chthon, "部落"或"民族". sayaway a binacadan no mikowanay a syiho tapang ato milobang, idaw ko sapikowan, to pdekowan, cacodadan. No mapolongay a kakawaw, nohekal sapisikol ato sapisaloma no holic idaw ko ahebalay to sapikowan. Tada malakowit ko nipicabas to kawaw mikowanay no syiho cay pakalaheci sa. sayaway a binacadan nokaodip cay kakapah,nikaodip no heni caay pakacabi to hayti ato mahka masomaday no tayliwko, sayaway a binacadan nayay ko kakolian, kiyo maongang misahicahica, saosin ko nikaodip no heni, cay katalakaw, nipicoda inayay ,pakoyocay talakaw, o mosabili' henay laetos to ko biliay nayay t oko eking, caay kakapah ko odip. . onikaodip no lotongay tahina ko maodipay, 2001 isaw ko nisaosi sayaway a binacadan tatama tatayna maselep ko nikaodip .
